---
title: "pH Tris Calibration"
format: html
---

```{python}
# Import necessary libraries
import polars as pl

# Read the CSV file into a Polars DataFrame
data = pl.read_csv("data/ph_test.csv")

# Display the first few rows of the DataFrame
data.head()
```

```{python}
# Convert 'pc_time' column to datetime format
data = data.with_columns(pl.col("pc_time").str.strptime(pl.Datetime))

# Display the updated DataFrame
data.head()
```

```{python}
# Plot 'vrse' vs 'pc_time' using Polars plotting
data.select(["pc_time", "vrse"]).plot(x="pc_time", y="vrse", title="VRSE vs PC Time")
```
